reviews.review_msg: Kendra is hands down my favourite SFU prof. She's always accessible for extra help, and puts in the work both in and out of class to make sure students understand the material. While there are a lot of readings, the subject matter is interesting and current (think entrepreneurs in Silicon Valley). Would take all courses with her if possible.

Kendra's lectures are very informative and she connects a lot of lectures to the readings, so make sure you're on top of them. She's an excellent speaker, very clear and concise and she simplifies theories or ideas that are hard to grasp. Her feedback on all assignments and tests given were understandable and she really tells you how to improve.
